mvp_summary.definition: A functioning AI Agent Skills system with 6 core skills that can process requirements, extract domain concepts, and generate basic project artifacts using VS Code Copilot as the skill invocation framework

features.name: Requirements Ingestion System

business_value.justification: Foundation for all other capabilities, enables automated processing

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Markdown parsing and normalization, text chunking algorithms

features.user_impact: Enables automated processing of requirement documents

features.name: Skills Framework Architecture (Copilot-Based)

business_value.justification: Core infrastructure leveraging existing Copilot framework

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Leverages existing VS Code Copilot infrastructure, skill routing through natural language

features.user_impact: Enables skill invocation through natural Copilot interactions

features.name: Basic Domain Analysis (ExtractConcepts + AlignEntities)

business_value.justification: Essential for understanding project scope and business domain

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Natural language processing, entity extraction and mapping

features.user_impact: Provides structured understanding of business domain

features.name: Goals and Success Criteria Extraction

business_value.justification: Drives all project decisions and prioritization

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Pattern matching and structured extraction from requirements

features.user_impact: Clarifies project objectives and success metrics

features.name: Basic W5H Analysis Framework

business_value.justification: Comprehensive requirement analysis foundation

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Multi-dimensional analysis and classification framework

features.user_impact: Ensures complete understanding of requirements context

features.name: Core Change Management System

business_value.justification: Essential for requirement traceability and evolution

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Document templates, naming conventions, traceability tracking

features.user_impact: Maintains requirement integrity throughout project lifecycle

features.name: Basic Progress Tracking and Reporting

business_value.justification: Enables project monitoring and stakeholder communication

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Status aggregation from markdown documents, simple reporting

features.user_impact: Provides visibility into skill development progress

features.name: Copilot Skill Integration

business_value.justification: Seamless skill access through existing Copilot interface

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Skills accessible via natural language prompts, documentation and examples

features.user_impact: Natural language skill invocation within existing Copilot workflow

features.name: Advanced Collaboration Diagram Generation

business_value.justification: Improves system design visualization and communication

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Mermaid diagram generation from requirements analysis

features.user_impact: Visual system understanding and stakeholder communication

features.name: Automated Scope Minimization

business_value.justification: Critical for project planning efficiency and MVP definition

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Business value assessment algorithms, prioritization matrix

features.user_impact: Automated MVP boundary definition and feature prioritization

features.name: Process Merging and Integration

business_value.justification: Enables reuse of existing organizational processes

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Complex process analysis and integration logic

features.user_impact: Integration with existing organizational workflows

features.name: Task Derivation and Dependency Analysis

business_value.justification: Direct improvement to project planning accuracy

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Dependency graph analysis, task breakdown algorithms

features.user_impact: Automated task identification and sequencing

features.name: PERT Effort Estimation

business_value.justification: Improves project planning accuracy and confidence

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Three-point estimation algorithms, confidence calculations

features.user_impact: Accurate effort estimation with confidence intervals

features.name: Schedule Generation and Optimization

business_value.justification: Complete project planning automation

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: DAG scheduling algorithms, resource optimization

features.user_impact: Automated project schedule generation

features.name: Advanced Change Impact Analysis

business_value.justification: Sophisticated change management capabilities

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Impact propagation analysis across artifacts

features.user_impact: Comprehensive understanding of change implications

features.name: Comprehensive Skill Assessment Framework

business_value.justification: Team capability development and tracking

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Assessment methodology, progress tracking system

features.user_impact: Team skill development monitoring and planning

features.name: Evolutionary Development Metrics Dashboard

business_value.justification: Long-term process improvement visibility

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Metrics aggregation and visualization system

features.user_impact: Process improvement insights and trend analysis

features.name: Advanced Stakeholder Communication Tools

business_value.justification: Improved team coordination capabilities

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Communication workflow automation

features.user_impact: Enhanced project communication and coordination

features.name: Cross-Project Domain Model Integration

business_value.justification: Organizational domain consistency

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Cross-project domain reconciliation algorithms

features.user_impact: Consistent domain modeling across organizational projects

features.name: Custom Framework Integration Support

business_value.justification: Extended ecosystem compatibility

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Framework-specific adapters and integration points

features.user_impact: Integration with external development frameworks

features.name: Machine Learning-Enhanced Requirement Classification

business_value.justification: Improved automation accuracy over time with sufficient training data

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: ML model training, integration with requirement processing

features.user_impact: Improved requirement analysis accuracy through learning

features.name: Natural Language Query Interface

business_value.justification: Alternative user interaction method for non-technical stakeholders

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: NLP query processing, skill routing system

features.user_impact: Natural language access to skill capabilities

features.name: Multi-Language Requirements Support

business_value.justification: Expanded market applicability for international teams

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Translation services, cultural context adaptation

features.user_impact: Support for non-English requirement documents

features.name: Git Integration for Requirement Version Control

business_value.justification: Enhanced change tracking granularity beyond markdown

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Git workflow integration, diff analysis

features.user_impact: Version control integration for distributed collaboration

features.name: Real-time Collaboration on Requirements

business_value.justification: Simultaneous multi-user editing capabilities

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: Conflict resolution, real-time synchronization

features.user_impact: Real-time collaborative requirement editing

features.name: Integration with External Project Management Tools

business_value.justification: Ecosystem connectivity for teams with established PM workflows

technical_complexity.implementation_notes: API integration, data synchronization with PM tools

features.user_impact: Integration with existing project management ecosystems

in_scope: 6 core AI skills covering requirements analysis workflow
VS Code Copilot-based skill invocation through natural language
Basic domain concept extraction and alignment
Skill documentation and usage examples for Copilot interaction
out_of_scope: External tool integrations beyond Copilot framework
Custom skill invocation UI (leveraging Copilot instead)

risks.description: Copilot Skill Discoverability: Users may not know how to invoke specific skills through Copilot
risks.impact: Skills may be underutilized due to unclear invocation patterns
risks.mitigation: Create clear skill documentation and example prompts, implement skill help system

risks.description: Domain Analysis Accuracy: Natural language processing may not achieve required accuracy
risks.impact: Core functionality may not meet quality standards
risks.mitigation: Implement rule-based fallbacks, plan for human validation workflow

risks.description: Change Management Adoption: Team may not follow new change management processes
risks.impact: Requirement traceability and evolution tracking compromised
risks.mitigation: Keep initial change management simple, demonstrate value early

risks.description: Markdown Processing Limitations: Complex requirements may not translate well to markdown
risks.impact: Some requirement types may be incompletely processed
risks.mitigation: Design extensible parsing system, validate with diverse requirement samples

risks.description: Skill Interdependency Management: Dependencies between skills may create implementation bottlenecks
risks.impact: Parallel development may be constrained, increasing timeline
risks.mitigation: Design skills with clear interfaces, implement mock dependencies for parallel development

mvp_launch: All 6 core skills successfully process sample requirements documents
Skills execute seamlessly within VS Code environment
Generated artifacts maintain traceability to source requirements
Change management system preserves requirement evolution history
Team can complete basic requirements analysis workflow without manual intervention
enhancement_phase: Advanced skills demonstrate measurable improvement in project planning accuracy
Generated collaboration diagrams are validated as accurate by technical stakeholders
Scope minimization recommendations align with actual project priorities
Task derivation produces actionable, properly sequenced project tasks

traceability.justification: Requirements ingestion directly maps to normalized requirement processing
Skills framework architecture leverages existing Copilot infrastructure for skill invocation
Domain analysis combines concept extraction and entity alignment
Goals extraction directly implements business goal and success criteria derivation
W5H analysis framework provides comprehensive requirement context analysis
Change management system implements requirement traceability and evolution tracking
Progress tracking implements measurement and reporting capabilities
Copilot integration provides natural language skill access within existing developer workflow
